content: mgreenbe(1) - Michael Greenberg - Assistant Professor - Stevens Institute of Technology MGREENBE(1) Assistant Professor @ Stevens CS MGREENBE(1) NAME Michael Greenberg -- assistant professor of computer science SYNOPSIS mgreenbe --email=michael@greenberg.science mgreenbe --office=Gateway Academic Center South, office 447 mgreenbe --office-hours=Mondays, 11am‚Äì1pm on Zoom mgreenbe --papers=all DESCRIPTION My research focuses on directly applying formalism to practical problems with usable tools. Much of my work takes place in the emerging field of semantics engineering, where I scale PL techniques up to work on real systems. My primary focus is on improving the POSIX shell and building tools to support it and its ecosystem. I work in a variety of other areas: contracts and gradual types; tools for directly expressing PL formalism, using logic programming and SMT solving; and foundational semantics for decidable languages, like Kleene algebra with tests.
